title: Print Hello World
description: Write a Go program that prints 'Hello World'.

title: Add Two Numbers
description: Given two integers a and b, print their sum.

title: String Length
description: Print the length of a string.

description: Check if a number is even or odd.

title: Loop Through Slice
description: Print all elements in a slice using range loop.

title: Reverse a String
description: Reverse a string using rune slice.

title: Greeting Function
description: Create a function greet(name) that prints Hello name.
hints: Define greet() and call it inside main.

title: Access Map Value
description: Access a value inside a Go map.

title: Check Substring
description: Check if a string contains a substring using strings.Contains.

title: Convert String to Int
description: Convert a string to integer using strconv.Atoi.
solution:
package main
import "fmt"
import "strconv"
func main(){
    n, _ := strconv.Atoi("42")
    fmt.Println(n)
}
